name: stirling-pdf
description: Stirling-PDF is a self-hosted all-in-one PDF toolkit that supports merging, splitting, converting, editing, and OCR through a powerful web interface.

features.title: Pdf Merging
features.description: Combines multiple PDF files into a single document

features.title: Pdf Splitting
features.description: Extracts specific pages or splits PDFs into separate files

features.title: Format Conversion
features.description: Converts PDFs to images, Word, Excel, or other formats and vice versa

features.title: Ocr Processing
features.description: Extracts text from scanned PDFs using optical character recognition

features.title: Page Manipulation
features.description: Rotates, reorders, or removes pages from PDF documents

features.title: Compression
features.description: Reduces PDF file size while maintaining acceptable quality

features.title: Watermarking
features.description: Adds text or image watermarks to PDF pages

features.title: Form Filling
features.description: Fills PDF forms and flattens form fields
